script.name: stcw.addValidationErrorsToFailureArrayForSub_UpdInWD
script.label: Add Validation Errors To Failure Array For Submit Or Update In WD
script.script: return stcw.addValidationErrorsToFailureArray(validationErrors, objectId, failureArray, "Validation Error", (isSubmit ? "SUBMIT ORDER" : "UPDATE ORDER"), "EOC");
